snippet: Federal prosecutors filed more charges against five people who are accused of helping to defraud customers of Bernard L. Madoff’s investment firm, as far back as the 1970s.
abstract: Federal prosecutors file more charges against five people who are accused of helping to defraud customers of Bernard L Madoff’s investment firm, as far back as the 1970s; five former employees of firm are Daniel Bonventre, Annette Bongiomo, Joann Crupi, Jerome O'Hara and George Perez.
lead_paragraph: Federal prosecutors filed more charges against five people who are accused of helping to defraud customers of Bernard L. Madoff’s investment firm, as far back as the 1970s.

headline.seo: Madoff Case Charges Expand for 5 Defendants
headline.main: Charges Expand in a Madoff Case
headline.print_headline: Charges Expand In a Madoff Case
